Sentencas: Mitigating degradation is essential for extending the lifetime of solid oxide electrochemical cells (SOCs).

Sentencas: The conditions leading to degradation, e.g. overpotentials, gas partial pressures, thermal gradients are hard, if not impossible, to retrieve experimentally.

Sentencas: Thus, to deconvolute the response from cell testing, modeling can be applied to understand the degradation phenomena in greater detail.
